bib.title: Symmetry-based structure entropy of complex networks
bib.author: Xiao, Yang-Hua and Wu, Wen-Tao and Wang, Hui and Xiong, Momiao and Wang, Wei
bib.abstract: 1. Illustration of two 3-regular graphs  To accurately measure the structural heterogeneity of complex networks, we define an entropy based on automorphism partition, abbreviated as EAP, as follows  2) p i = | V i | ∑ j | V j | = | V i | N , where N is the number of vertices in a graph
bib.journal: Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications
